languages.text: "Соломон, здесь не задворки какого-то грязного улья. Немедленно прекрати свои самоуправские расследования, и чтобы больше ни одной жалобы на тебя не слышал{mf||а}!"

traits.locale_text: "Соломон, здесь не Адептус Арбитес — немедленно прекрати все свои расследования и чтобы больше ни одной жалобы на тебя не слышал{mf||а}!"

languages.text: "Solomorne, this is not some filthy hive backwater. You will cease your self-righteous investigations at once, and you had better hope I hear no further complaints about your conduct! "
languages.original_text: "Соломон, здесь не задворки какого-то грязного улья. Немедленно прекрати свои самоуправские расследования, и чтобы больше ни одной жалобы на тебя не слышал{mf||а}!"

traits.locale_text: "Solomorne, this is not some filthy hive backwater. You will cease your self-righteous investigations at once, and you had better hope I hear no further complaints about your conduct! "
"Solomorne, this is not some filthy hive backwater. You will cease your self-righteous investigations at once, and you had better hope I hear no further complaints about your conduct! "
"Solomorne, this is not some filthy hive backwater. You will cease your self-righteous investigations at once, and you had better hope I hear no further complaints about your conduct! "
"Solomorne, this is not some filthy hive backwater. You will cease your self-righteous investigations at once, and you had better hope I hear no further complaints about your conduct! "
"Solomorne, this is not some filthy hive backwater. You will cease your self-righteous investigations at once, and you had better hope I hear no further complaints about your conduct! "

languages.text: 「ソロモーン、ここは薄汚れたハイヴの辺境なんかじゃない。独善的な捜査をすぐに中止しろ。そして、君の行動についてこれ以上の苦情が{mf|俺|私}の耳に入らないことを祈っていろ！」
languages.original_text: "Solomorne, this is not some filthy hive backwater. You will cease your self-righteous investigations at once, and you had better hope I hear no further complaints about your conduct! "

traits.locale_text: 「ソロモーン、ここは薄汚れたハイヴの辺境なんかじゃない。独善的な捜査をすぐに中止しろ。そして、君の行動についてこれ以上の苦情が{mf|俺|私}の耳に入らないことを祈っていろ！」

languages.text: "Burası ücra bir kovan değil. Kendi başına yürüttüğün soruşturmalara derhâl son vereceksin. Umarım tutumlarınla ilgili daha başka şikâyetler işitmem!"
languages.original_text: "Solomorne, this is not some filthy hive backwater. You will cease your self-righteous investigations at once, and you had better hope I hear no further complaints about your conduct! "

traits.locale_text: "Burası öyle pislik yuvası bir ücra kovan değil. Bu kendi başına yürüttüğün soruşturmalara derhâl bir son vereceksin. Umarım ki bu tutumlarınla ilgili daha fazla şikâyet duymam!"

languages.text: «Solomorne, esto no es una colmena olvidada. Deje inmediatamente sus investigaciones moralistas. ¡Más le vale que no reciba más quejas sobre su conducta!».
languages.original_text: "Solomorne, this is not some filthy hive backwater. You will cease your self-righteous investigations at once, and you had better hope I hear no further complaints about your conduct! "

traits.locale_text: «Solomorne, esto no es una colmena olvidada. Deje inmediatamente sus investigaciones moralistas. ¡Más le vale que no reciba más quejas sobre su conducta!».

languages.text: “索罗蒙，这里可不是什么肮脏的巢都底层。你那些自以为是的调查，给我马上停下来！你最好祈祷一下，希望我以后再也别听到任何人抱怨你的所作所为！”
languages.original_text: "Solomorne, this is not some filthy hive backwater. You will cease your self-righteous investigations at once, and you had better hope I hear no further complaints about your conduct! "

traits.locale_text: “索罗蒙，这里可不是什么肮脏的巢都底层。你那些自以为是的调查，给我马上停下来！你最好祈祷一下，希望我以后再也别听到任何人抱怨你的所作所为！”

languages.text: « Solomorne, vous ne vous trouvez pas dans un minable monde-ruche. Je vous somme de mettre fin à vos enquêtes moralisatrices. J'espère ne plus jamais recevoir de plaintes à votre encontre !  »
languages.original_text: "Solomorne, this is not some filthy hive backwater. You will cease your self-righteous investigations at once, and you had better hope I hear no further complaints about your conduct! "

traits.locale_text: « Solomorne, vous ne vous trouvez pas dans un minable monde-ruche. Je vous somme de mettre fin à vos enquêtes moralisatrices. J'espère ne plus jamais recevoir de plaintes à votre encontre !  »

languages.text: "Solomorne, das hier ist nicht irgendeine Makropole. Ihr werdet Eure selbstgerechten Ermittlungen umgehend einstellen, und wehe, mir kommen weitere Beschwerden über Euer Verhalten zu Ohren!"
languages.original_text: "Solomorne, this is not some filthy hive backwater. You will cease your self-righteous investigations at once, and you had better hope I hear no further complaints about your conduct! "

traits.locale_text: "Solomorne, das hier ist nicht irgendeine Makropole. Ihr werdet Eure selbstgerechten Ermittlungen umgehend einstellen, und wehe, mir kommen weitere Beschwerden über Euer Verhalten zu Ohren!"
